main.flickr_analysis module¶

main.flickr_analysis.compute_geotag_usage()¶

Prints the relative amount of geotted photos for different tags.

main.flickr_analysis.plot_normalized_tag_usage_per_year(tags, woe_id, save2docs=False)¶
main.flickr_analysis.plot_photos_per_year(woe_id=None, save2docs=False)¶

Saves the plot in the flickr plots directory. Attention: Results are incorrect if there are to many photo uploads per year for this place/country.

Parameters:
  • woe_id – id of the place/country the data is based on
  • save2docs – this flags saves the plot directly in the documentation
main.flickr_analysis.plot_wsl_flooding_data(save2docs=False)¶
